verses.text: \w That|strong="H3117"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w passed|strong="H1961"\w* without \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* histories \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w former|strong="H6440"\w* \w times|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w reading|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*,

\w They|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H4672"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w place|strong="H3027"\w* \w where|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w*, \w how|strong="H0834"\w* Mardochai \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w discovered|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* treason \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Bagathan \w and|strong="H3027"\w* Thares \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* kill \w king|strong="H4428"\w* Assuerus.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w when|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* heard \w this|strong="H2088"\w*, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* honour \w and|strong="H4428"\w* reward hath Mardochai \w received|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* fidelity? \w His|strong="H5921"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w ministers|strong="H8334"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w He|strong="H6213"\w* hath \w received|strong="H5921"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* reward \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* immediately: \w Who|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*? \w for|strong="H5921"\w* Aman \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w coming|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w inner|strong="H1004"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w might|strong="H0834"\w* \w order|strong="H0559"\w* Mardochai \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* gibbet \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: Aman standeth \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Let \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* ought \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* desirous \w to|strong="H0559"\w* honour? \w But|strong="H0376"\w* Aman \w thinking|strong="H0559"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* supposing \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* honour \w no|strong="H4480"\w* \w other|strong="H0376"\w* \w but|strong="H0376"\w* \w himself|strong="H3820"\w*,
\w Answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* desireth \w to|strong="H0413"\w* honour,

Ought \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w apparel|strong="H3830"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* rideth \w upon|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w crown|strong="H3804"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w first|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w nobles|strong="H6579"\w* \w hold|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* going \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w street|strong="H7339"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* say: \w Thus|strong="H3602"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* honoured, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* hath \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w mind|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* honour.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: \w Make|strong="H6213"\w* \w haste|strong="H4116"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w robe|strong="H3830"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* Mardochai \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jew|strong="H3064"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* sitteth before \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* palace. Beware thou pass \w over|strong="H5307"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* Aman \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w robe|strong="H3830"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* arraying Mardochai \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w street|strong="H7339"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* setting \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w on|strong="H3847"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*, \w went|strong="H0376"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w*: \w This|strong="H3602"\w* honour \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* worthy \w of|strong="H4428"\w*, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* hath \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w mind|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* honour.

\w But|strong="H4428"\w* Mardochai \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Aman \w made|strong="H7725"\w* haste \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w go|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w mourning|strong="H0057"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w having|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w covered|strong="H2645"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0802"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w told|strong="H0559"\w* Zares \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w friends|strong="H0157"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* befallen \w him|strong="H0853"\w*. \w And|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w men|strong="H2450"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0802"\w* counsel, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* Mardochai \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w begun|strong="H2490"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, thou canst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* resist \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w in|strong="H0802"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w As|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* compelled \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w quickly|strong="H0926"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* queen \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w*.
